scripts.docker-tmp: mkdir -p tmp && rm -rf tmp/shared tmp/presenter && cp -r ../shared tmp && mkdir tmp/presenter && cp -r ../../presenter/src tmp/presenter && cp ../../presenter/Cargo.toml tmp/presenter
scripts.docker-build: yarn docker-tmp && docker build -t wildcat .; rm -rf tmp/shared tmp/presenter && rmdir --ignore-fail-on-non-empty tmp
